attributes.action: Force Cllr Doug Rands of Billingshurst Parish Council to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cllr Rands has recently been found guilty of breaking the standing orders for a parish councillor and suspended for 1 month.  He was also accused of 18 other infractions mainly against the long-suffering parish clerk.  We the undersigned request that he is permanently removed as a parish councillor and is prevented from standing again

rejection.details:
Petitions to the Number 10 site should request actions that can be taken by the Prime Minister or Government, as explained in the terms and conditions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms

This issue is outside the remit of the PM and Government and we suggest you contact the Standards Board for England, an independent body which has the power to deal with issues of this kind: http://www.standardsboard.gov.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
